mapper.select: SELECT ply.id , ply.userid , ply.currentlevel , ply.language , ply.exppoint , ply.score , ply.heart , ply.lastupdatedate FROM PLAYER ply WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT ply.id , ply.userid , ply.currentlevel , ply.language , ply.exppoint , ply.score , ply.heart , ply.lastupdatedate FROM PLAYER ply WHERE ply.userid = #{userId} AND ply.language = #{language}

SELECT ply.id as playerid, ply.userid, usr.avatar, usr.username, usr.email, ply.score, ply.exppoint, ply.currentlevel, ply.lastupdatedate FROM player ply INNER JOIN user usr ON usr.id = ply.userid ORDER BY ply.score DESC LIMIT 5;
